Name: Chocolate Biscuit
Ingredients: 30 ml De Kuyper Brown Crème de Cacao
30 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Sweet and rich, with coffee and chocolate - one to chase dessert.
History: Created in 1999 by Gillian Stanfield at The Atlantic Bar & Grill, London, England.
